articles.title: PGA Tour 2K21 trailer teases new golf game - Polygon
articles.description: 2K Sports is returning to golf with PGA Tour 2K21, a continuation of HB Studios’ The Golf Club franchise. A teaser trailer released Wednesday promises a full reveal on May 14. No platforms or release date were announced.
